message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,150,000. This is a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,050,000 for your product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $1,050,000 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.  Let's close this deal!
